column4: Thanks for the link about the filetree with Ubuntu. It makes a bit more sense now, but it is definitely one thing I don't like as much as Windoze. Is there a reason for it's complexity?
no reason really, its how linux has evolved
whoever wrote all the software decided that was the best way to organize things
its only complex because you're unfamiliar with it.  the more you use linux, the easier it gets
